0.text: Innate: Ivern cannot attack nor damage non-epic  monsters. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a 2.5 second  channel that will plant a grove upon the camp. Placing a grove costs  131.63 − 111.65 (based on level) health and  148.5 − 110.25 (based on level) mana. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first 0.15 seconds and in the last 0.5 seconds.

1.text: Ivern cannot place a grove while he is unable to cast abilities.

2.text: The grove matures over 40 − 1 (based on level) seconds. When fully matured, Ivern can target the camp again to free it after a 0.5-second cast time, clearing the camp and receiving the  full gold and  full experience bounties. Using  Smite on a monster within the grove will instantly free the camp regardless of maturity.

3.text: If the camp's large monster has already been slain prior to planting a grove, Ivern will free the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the grove will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.

4.text: Starting at level 5, freeing the  Red Brambleback or the  Blue Sentinel leaves behind a sapling for 60 seconds that can be gathered by one allied  champion to gain the camp's buff. If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a sapling that only Ivern can consume.

0.text: Active: Ivern throws a vine in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  rooting them for a short duration, during which they are also  revealed. Rootcaller can be recast while the target is  rooted.

1.text: Ivern and allied champions can select the target  rooted by Rootcaller to  dash to their location, with allies stopping at   their attack range and Ivern stopping within   125 range from the target.

2.text: Recast: Ivern  dashes to the target.

0.text: Passive: While in Ivern is in  brush, his basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving brush.

1.text: Ivern periodically stocks a Brushmaker charge, up to a maximum of 3.

2.text: Active: Ivern grows a patch of  brush at the target location for 30 seconds, granting  sight of the area within and around it for 3 seconds. Brushmaker spawns more brush if used near terrain or other brush.

0.text: Active: Ivern can target an allied champion,  Daisy, or himself to place a  shield for 2 seconds.

1.text: The target then explodes to deal magic damage and  slow nearby enemies for 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Ivern summons his sentinel friend  Daisy to his side, who lands 350 units away from him in the target direction and remains on the field for up to 60 seconds as a controllable  pet.

1.text: Daisy! can be recast at any time while  Daisy is alive.

2.text: Recast: Ivern commands  Daisy to move to the target location. If cast on Ivern,  Daisy will follow him.

3.text: The recast of Daisy! can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 70 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 7% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 35%.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 heal for this item's passive effect, Starlit Grace.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – STARLIT GRACE: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat,  heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 70 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 7% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 35%.

Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: You reveal the target area for 3 seconds. After a 2.5 second delay, a beam of light strikes the ground. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 360 (based on target's level), while enemy champions take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (120 second cooldown; 5500 range).
